title: OT16: Avada Threadavra!
summary:
Key ideas
- The post is an open thread where readers can post anything they want.
- The author thanks everyone who attended the meetups earlier in the month.
- The author mentions the end of "Harry Potter and the Methods Of Rationality" fanfiction by Eliezer Yudkowsky.
- HPMOR wrap parties are taking place in various cities.
- The author mentions wanting to attend the Detroit party.
- The author recommends SPARC, a free camp for high-school students interested in game theory, cognitive science, and statistics.
- Comment of the week is about a real-life trolley problem and the British government's response to it.
- The post includes a request for legal advice.

Key learnings
- The post is an open thread.
- The author values meeting readers in person and recommends reading "Harry Potter and the Methods Of Rationality."
- The author recommends SPARC for high-school students.
- The British government's response to the real-life trolley problem is questionable.

Key questions
- None mentioned.
